attributes.action: Cyclists should pay road tax and insurance
attributes.additional_details:
Cyclist use a main road 
Drivers using vehicles pay a great amount for insurance and road tax and therefore feel these cyclists are no different
attributes.background: After being verbally abused and slandered by a cyclist today almost causing me to collide into him as he follows my vehicle very closely I thinks it's about time the government made cyclists pay road tax and insurance they use a main road sometimes causing serious accidents

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Introduce testing, tax and vehicle registration/MOT requirements for cyclists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607217
